ygData.subject: RE: Rarity of lambent stones
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know about Grimfeather, but I recently had the opportunity to charm fight a Hill Giant and a Griffon.  I would have bet money that the Griffon would
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know about Grimfeather, but I recently had the opportunity to charm
fight a Hill Giant and a Griffon. I would have bet money that the Griffon
would win, but the Hill Giant totally ripped him a new orifice. The HG
finished the fight with 1/4 to 1/3 of his hitpoints. I lead the giant off a
ways, then ran back to the Griff corpse and looted it. Lo and Behold!! 5
silver, 7 copper! :)

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]

> From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:slasher@...]

>

>
> btw,
>
> GrimFeather vs. Hill Giant, I'm putting money on the bird.
> That is one fast and elite griffon. Do not judge him
> incorrectly, he's stronger than he looks.
>
> Harmonic Distortion, 40th unchained melody.
> League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
> < Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
